name: Demons in the Dark
description:
This is a simple story of a boy saving the Princess from a Demon in a dungeon.  However, as the boy progresses in the dungeon, things aren't as they seem.  

As the boy makes his way around the dungeon, he fights his demons, but nonetheless he is determined to get to the Princess at all cost!

Also, if you liked this game and want to see more future games/stories from Ruth Studio, please considering donating!  If you have any questions or comments you can contact us at Ruthstudiogames@gmail.com.

Thank you for playing!
